explains: adj. 暴怒的；忿怒填胸的
v. 使发怒；触怒（enrage 的过去分词）

sentences.en: She was enraged at the injustice of the remark.
sentences.cn: 她被那句话的不公激怒了。

sentences.en: Many were enraged by the discriminatory practice.
sentences.cn: 很多人被这种歧视性的做法激怒了。

sentences.en: She was enraged with Taylor because he had deflowered her daughter.
sentences.cn: 她对于泰勒非常愤怒，因为他夺去了她女儿的贞操。
